WHO director for Americas urges US help as coronavirus surges in region tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740927 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/740927/who-director-for-americas-urges-us-help-as-coronavirus-surges-in-region/story/ The World Health Organization's regional director for the Americas urged the United States on Tuesday to keep helping countries in the region to fight the novel coronavirus even as the Trump administration leaves the UN agency. Wed, 03 Jun 2020 02:08:24 +0800

Kaya ang virtual wealth coach na si Chinkee Tan, nagbigay ng top 10 business na puwedeng gawin online na tiyak daw na kikita. Wed, 03 Jun 2020 01:53:56 +0800

Canadians watching US in horror and consternation, says PM Trudeau tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740922 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/740922/canadians-watching-us-in-horror-and-consternation-says-pm-trudeau/story/ Canada's Prime Minister Justin Trudeau, when asked about US President Donald Trump's possibly calling in the military to quell protests, paused for more than 20 seconds before answering that Canadians were watching in horror what was happening in the United States. Wed, 03 Jun 2020 00:57:40 +0800
Repatriate laments lack of social distancing in sweeper flight tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740923 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740923/repatriate-laments-lack-of-social-distancing-in-sweeper-flight/story/ A Filipino migrant worker who was repatriated last week amid the coronavirus pandemic lamented the lack of social distancing in the sweeper flights arranged by the government.“It s like the typical commercial flights. As in full talaga. Of course as a passenger mag-speculate ka talaga, Hala akala ko ba? Nakaka-praning talaga. How can I tell if this person is healthy?” she added. Wed, 03 Jun 2020 00:54:29 +0800
Commuters in provinces also struggle with limited public transport tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740919 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/regions/740919/commuters-in-provinces-also-struggle-with-limited-public-transport/story/ Commuters in the provinces also suffered difficulty moving around even after some modes of public transportation have been allowed after the easing up of community quarantines. Biden vows to heal US racial wounds, slams Trump as divisive tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740917 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/740917/biden-vows-to-heal-us-racial-wounds-slams-trump-as-divisive/story/ Democratic presidential candidate Joe Biden on Tuesday vowed in a speech to try to heal the racial divide in America and blasted President Donald Trump's response to protests over racism and police misconduct. Wed, 03 Jun 2020 00:14:55 +0800

Wed, 03 Jun 2020 00:14:55 +0800

Tue, 02 Jun 2020 23:56:40 +0800
DOH: COVID-19 deaths on a downtrend tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740912 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740912/doh-covid-19-deaths-on-a-downtrend/story/ The mortality rate from the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) in the Philippines continues to show a downtrend with the Department of Health (DOH) reporting only three new deaths on June 1, the lowest since March, a health official said Tuesday. Tue, 02 Jun 2020 23:46:26 +0800
House gives final OK to COVID-related anti-discrimination bill tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740911 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740911/house-gives-final-ok-to-covid-related-anti-discrimination-bill/story/ The House of Representatives on Tuesday approved on third reading the measure seeking to prohibit and penalize discrimination against persons who are declared confirmed, suspect, probable, and recovered cases of COVID-19, as well as against healthcare workers and service providers. Tue, 02 Jun 2020 23:38:40 +0800
GMA News Raffy Tima walks from Cubao to Makati with workers tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740908 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/740908/gma-news-raffy-tima-walks-from-cubao-to-makati-with-workers/story/ GMA News reporter Raffy Tima on Tuesday got the feel of what some ordinary folk are experiencing due to the lack of transportation when he joined employees in walking to their workplace. According to his report on “24 Oras,” Tima spent nearly two hours walking from Cubao, Quezon City to Guadalupe, Makati along with some workers he met along the way. Tue, 02 Jun 2020 23:28:19 +0800
Health workers with COVID-19 now at 2,669; recoveries now at 1,438 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740906 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740906/health-workers-with-covid-19-now-at-2-669-recoveries-now-at-1-438/story/ The Department of Health (DOH) on Tuesday reported that 63 more healthcare workers have contracted the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) as of June 1, bringing the total to 2,669. Tue, 02 Jun 2020 23:19:27 +0800
Single mom, nakaligtas sa COVID-19 pero hindi sa paniningil ng kaniyang kasera sa upa tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740905 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/740905/single-mom-nakaligtas-sa-covid-19-pero-hindi-sa-paniningil-ng-kaniyang-kasera-sa-upa/story/ Nakaligtas man sa kamatayan mula sa coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), patuloy naman ang kalbaryo ng isang single mom sa Quezon City dahil pinapalayas na siya ng kaniyang kasera sa inuupahang bahay dahil wala siyang pambayad sa renta ngayon panahon ng pandemic. Tue, 02 Jun 2020 23:05:55 +0800
Underground Chinese clinic discovered in Parañaque tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740904 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/740904/underground-chinese-clinic-discovered-in-paranaque/story/ Authorities raided another unlicensed medical clinic that caters to Chinese coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) patients in a subdivision in Parañaque City. Tue, 02 Jun 2020 22:49:59 +0800
